Package org.middleheaven.global.text

Culture dependent Formatter implementations.

          Description

Interface Summary
CultureModel Represents an application specific Culture set of formats.
CultureModelFactory  
Formatter<T> Formats an object value to a String.
ParsableFormatter<T> Formats an object value to a String and back.
